EmailTemplate.subject: Discover with VMTurbo | Simplicity from Complexity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DISCOVER. Your Virtual Datacenter Is a World Unto Itself.
CLICK TO REQUEST A FREE DEMO: <http://bit.ly/1wkElmq>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Within 15 minutes of deployment, VMTurbo looks under the hood of your IT stack and gives it to you straight:
"Things are pretty terrible in there," or maybe just, "Things could be managed a lot more efficiently." VMTurbo generates a complete list of risk items across your infrastructure, as well as the specific actions that will eliminate them. Are your VMs rightsized? Do they reside on the optimal host? Have you maximized potential VM density across your environment? Think of it as our State of Your Environment Address.
Our Discover video <http://bit.ly/1jdmh6k> in the Evaluation Resource Center walks you through the look under the hood to ensure you're getting the most out of your VMTurbo trial.
Questions, comments, or feedback? Contact us <http://bit.ly/1gHVfGN>.
Your IT control system, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
